name: Smol'sspacefacts
0:
”Alexa open space fact finder”
”Alexa ask space fact finder for a fact”
”Alexa tell space fact finder to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space fact finder
des:
Ask for a random space fact, and learn about various interesting topics, like dark matter or space exploration.

Space Fact Finder provides fun anyone can appreciate and is sure to expand your knowledge.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Fact Finder" or "Alexa, open Space Fact Finder" to get a random fact!.

At anytime, you can stop the process by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
